medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started gradually at 2 PM yesterday after returning from a trip. It progressed and worsened over the evening. The pain is located in the lower abdomen and has moved around somewhat. Patient attempted an enema and gas medication without significant relief. Associated symptoms include chills and 2 episodes of bilious nonbloody emesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Reportedly benign thyroid nodule for which she underwent thyroidectomy as a child, and resultant hypothyroidism.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of IBD or GI cancer.
